com.yammer.metrics.guice

Class InstrumentationModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      • com.yammer.metrics.guice.InstrumentationModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.inject.Module

    public class InstrumentationModule
extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule
    A Guice module which instruments methods annotated with the Metered and Timed annotations.
    See Also:
    Gauge, Metered, Timed, MeteredInterceptor, TimedInterceptor, GaugeInjectionListener
